name: Electric Smoker Smoked Oysters
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Simple yet elegant oysters smoked in their own shells. I've never been a fan of canned oysters but they don't even compare to these. Smoking them in their own liquor plumps them up and gives them a great texture.
ingredients: 12 each fresh oysters in shells, rinsed and scrubbed clean
directions: Preheat an electric smoker to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C)
Shuck oysters and add them to a bowl along with their liquor
Add salt and let marinate for 20 minutes
Drain liquor from the oysters and place an oyster in each half shell
Place shells directly on the grate and smoke for 1 1/2 hours
Top each oyster with a dash of Worcestershire sauce before serving
